sources.title: Violent Saturday (1955) Directed by Richard Fleischer, Starring Victor Mature, Richard Egan, Stephen McNally
sources.description: Violent Saturday is a 1955 American FILM NOlR crime film directed by Richard Fleischer and starring Victor Mature, Richard Egan and Stephen McNally. In supporting roles are Virginia Leith, Sylvia Sidney and Ernest Borgnine. Violent Saturday was filmed in color on location in Bisbee, Arizona.   You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia and read an article from F ILM NOlR of the Week . A detailed article from online blog D for Doom  may still be available.

sources.title: Violent Saturday (1955)
sources.description: Victor Mature. Richard Egan, Stephen McNally, Virginia Leith, Lee Marvin, J. Carrol Naish, Sylvia Sidney, Ernest Borgnine

sources.title: Violent Saturday (1955)
sources.description: Three men case a small town very carefully, with plans to rob the bank on the upcoming Saturday, which turns violent and deadly. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/violent-saturday-1955/

metadata.Plot: A number of otherwise insignificant small-town stories erupt into drama when a gang of hoodlums decides to rob the local bank. A father looking for pride in his son's eyes, a timid clerk who is a peeping Tom by night, a man striving to rewin his wife's love, an Amish farmer faced with viciousness, and a proper older woman turned thief, all find themselves entangled with the bank robbers as a peaceful weekend turns violent.
metadata.Actors: Victor Mature, Richard Egan, Stephen McNally
